SRP.Q: In the chord chart, what is the next arc in the clockwise direction from arc TCM Hospital?
SRP.A: The next arc clockwise from arc TCM Hospital is arc {Maternal and Child Health Center}.

SRP.Q: In the chord chart, what is the next arc in the counterclockwise direction from arc Maternal and Child Health Center?
SRP.A: The next arc counterclockwise from arc Maternal and Child Health Center is arc {TCM Hospital}.

VPR.Q: Which arc has the largest output flow in this chord chart?
VPR.A: {TCM Hospital} has the largest output flow.

VPR.Q: Which arc has the largest input flow in this chord chart?
VPR.A: {Maternal and Child Health Center} has the largest input flow.

NF.Q: Which pairs of nodes in the chord chart have a flow greater than 425? Please list the source node, target node, and the corresponding flow value.
NF.A: There is a flow of {627} from {TCM Hospital} to {Maternal and Child Health Center}, a flow of {541} from {Maternal and Child Health Center} to {TCM Hospital}, a flow of {482} from {Commdata_unity Health Center} to {Maternal and Child Health Center}.

NF.Q: Which pairs of nodes in the chord chart have a flow less than 324? Please list the source node, target node, and the corresponding flow value.
NF.A: There is a flow of {280} from {Commdata_unity Health Center} to {TCM Hospital}, a flow of {194} from {TCM Hospital} to {Commdata_unity Health Center}.

NF.Q: Which pairs of nodes in the chord chart have a flow between 237 and 511? Please list the source node, target node, and the corresponding flow value.
NF.A: There is a flow of {482} from {Commdata_unity Health Center} to {Maternal and Child Health Center}, a flow of {368} from {Maternal and Child Health Center} to {Commdata_unity Health Center}, a flow of {280} from {Commdata_unity Health Center} to {TCM Hospital}.

NC.Q: Which flow is larger: from Commdata_unity Health Center to Maternal and Child Health Center or from Commdata_unity Health Center to TCM Hospital?
NC.A: The flow from {Commdata_unity Health Center} to {Maternal and Child Health Center} is larger.

NC.Q: Which flow is the largest: from Maternal and Child Health Center to TCM Hospital, from TCM Hospital to Maternal and Child Health Center, or from Commdata_unity Health Center to TCM Hospital?
NC.A: The flow from {TCM Hospital} to {Maternal and Child Health Center} is the largest.

MSR.Q: Which category has the highest proportion of outgoing flow relative to its total flow?
MSR.A: The category with the highest proportion of outgoing flow relative to its total flow is {Commdata_unity Health Center}.

MSR.Q: Which pair has the strongest chord connection in this chord chart?
MSR.A: The strongest chord connection is between {Maternal and Child Health Center} and {TCM Hospital}.

VA.Q: To minimize the crossings between chords, please reorder the outer arcs and list the reorder arc order in clockwise direction.
VA.A: The reordered arc order in clockwise direction is: {Arc TCM Hospital, Arc Maternal and Child Health Center, Arc Commdata_unity Health Center}.
